## ACTIVITY

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
activity <- read.csv("C:/Users/Brody/Documents/CKME136/AIRPORT ACTIVITY/activity.csv")
```

```{r}
names(activity)[1] <- "Date"
```
```{r}
activity <- activity[, -c(4:7)]
```

Toronto
```{r}
toronto_activity <- sqldf("SELECT Date, SUM(Value) as Value FROM activity WHERE Geo GLOB 'TORONTO*' GROUP BY Date")
```

```{r}
toronto_activity <- toronto_activity[-1 ,]
```
